channel.name: Sample Channel
channel.desc: This is a sample channel for display confirmation. Notifications are generated using AI and scripts. Images are obtained from https://pixabay.com/.

announcements.title: 🌸 Spring Has Arrived! Pansy and Viola Seedlings Are In Stock
announcements.body:
A wide variety of colorful pansy and viola seedlings have arrived! ✨
Why not brighten up your garden or balcony this spring?
We're happy to offer advice on how to grow them, so feel free to ask us! 😊

Want to add some green to your room? 🌿 How about trying houseplants?
They not only purify the air but also make lovely interior decor!
We have many varieties perfect for beginners!

announcements.title: 🍳 Easy-to-Start Herb Growing Kits
announcements.body:
Herb growing kits for your kitchen are now in stock! 🌱
We have popular herbs like mint, basil, and rosemary that you can use in your cooking.
Why not add fresh herbs to your meals?

Don't let the summer heat get you down! ☀️ We're holding a succulent growing workshop next month.
Learn tips on watering, choosing sunny spots, and other secrets to keeping your succulents healthy! 🌵

announcements.title: 👨‍👧‍👦 How About a Gift for Father's Day?
announcements.body:
Looking for a Father's Day gift to show your appreciation? 🌻
We have a wide selection of flowers that men will love, including popular sunflowers and refreshing anthuriums.
Show your dad how much you care!

We're rearranging the store today! 🛠️ New products are arriving one after another.
We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause during your visit. 🙇‍♀️

announcements.title: 🪴 Gardening Supplies, Fully Stocked!
announcements.body:
We have a wide range of items to make gardening more enjoyable, from stylish watering cans to easy-to-use pruning shears.
Whether you're a beginner or an experienced gardener, please take a look!

Thank you for visiting today! 😊
The hot days continue, so please take care of yourselves.
We look forward to seeing you all tomorrow! ☀️

announcements.title: 🌵 Popular Succulent Festa Now On!
announcements.body:
From rare varieties to classic succulents, we have a large selection!
Whether you're a collector or a beginner, you're sure to find your favorite pot!
Period: April 20th - April 30th, 2025 🎉

We've started a free coffee tasting service in the store! ☕
Please feel free to relax and enjoy the flowers.
You can also consult us about your garden! 🗣️

announcements.title: 🌺 Heartwarming Carnations for Mother's Day
announcements.body:
Mother's Day is almost here! We have a wide variety of colorful carnations in stock 💐
Why not give your mom a wonderful surprise to show your appreciation?
Gift wrapping is available, so please let us know! 🎁

During the humid rainy season 🌧️
Why not decorate your room with eucalyptus leaves for a refreshing scent?
It can also help repel insects! 🍃

announcements.title: Summer Vegetable Seedlings, Popular and Available Now! 🍅🍆
announcements.body:
Summer vegetable seedlings perfect for home gardens have arrived!
Why not enjoy fresh, homegrown vegetables like tomatoes, eggplants, and bell peppers?
Our staff will kindly teach you how to grow them! 👍

Looking for a small green gift? 🎁
Palm-sized mini cacti have arrived! 🌵
Just placing them on your desk or windowsill will bring you comfort! 😊

announcements.title: 🌱 Potting Workshop to Be Held!
announcements.body:
Would you like to create your own original potted plant arrangement? 
Beginners are welcome! From handling soil to choosing seedlings, 
this workshop is fun to learn! 
Details and registration are available at the store. 📅

What a lovely day today! ☀️
Our store is filled with various seasonal flowers in full bloom.
Please stop by for a stroll! 🚶‍♀️

announcements.title: 🐛 Having trouble with plant pests and diseases?
announcements.body:
Let's protect your precious plants from pests and diseases! 
We have a wide range of environmentally friendly organic pesticides and effective control products. 
Please feel free to consult our expert staff! 😉

Rainy day service! ☔
Today, all customers who visit will receive a free plant nutrient! 🎁
Please be careful on your way here.

announcements.title: 🆕 New Arrival! Rare Air Plants In Stock
announcements.body:
Rare varieties of popular air plants have arrived! ✨
Since they don't need soil, you can display them however you like!
How about adding them as an accent to your room?

Today's high is forecast to be 28℃! 🥵
Please water your flowers generously in the morning or evening.
Your plants are thirsty too! 💧

announcements.title: 🌷 Tulip Fair Announcement
announcements.body:
Tulip bulbs to color your spring are now in stock! 🌷
Find your favorite from a wide variety of colorful options.
Next spring is sure to be something to look forward to! 😊

Do you live with pets? 🌿 We recommend pet-friendly houseplants.
Choose varieties that are safe even if accidentally ingested, and enjoy greenery safely with your furry friends! 🐶🐱

announcements.title: 🌾 Autumn Seven Herbs, a Refreshing Touch
announcements.body:
It's a bit early, but seedlings of the autumn seven herbs have started to arrive.
Plants that evoke the Japanese seasons, like Susuki grass and bellflowers.
Why not plant them in your garden and feel the early signs of autumn?

Today, we're specially displaying rare flowers grown in the store!
It's a valuable opportunity you rarely get, so please come and see! 👀

announcements.title: ✨ Supporting New Beginnings! Greenery to Brighten Your Room
announcements.body:
To those moving or starting a new chapter.
Placing greenery in your room brings healing and vitality! 🌱
We also have easy-to-care-for beginner sets, so please consult us!

Today's recommended flower by our staff is the 'Ranunculus'! 💐
Its layers of petals are so gorgeous, just looking at them makes you feel happy! 💖

announcements.title: 🍃 Refreshing Herb Tea for Summer
announcements.body:
Perfect for the hot season, herb tea! 🌿
It's especially delicious when brewed with homegrown herbs like mint and lemongrass.
Tea bags and dried herbs are also available! 😋

Thank you for visiting us this weekend! 
We're sure the plants were happy to see you too! 😊
We look forward to seeing you all next week with more wonderful plants! 🌱

announcements.title: 💧 Solve Dryness! Plants with Humidifying Effects
announcements.body:
Is winter dryness bothering you? ⛄️
Did you know there are plants that can humidify your room just by being there?
We have beautiful varieties like Aglaonema and Monstera! ✨

Today's lunch was pasta made with basil grown in our store! 🍝
The fresh herb aroma really whetted our appetites! 😋
Why not try growing your own ingredients in your home garden?

announcements.title: 🌹 Rose Season is Here! See Our Beautiful Roses
announcements.body:
Our rose garden is now in full bloom! 🌹
Colorful and beautiful roses are blooming, and a sweet scent fills the air.
Find your favorite rose and be sure to take some photos! 📸

A few months have passed since we opened! 
This is all thanks to your patronage. 
We will continue to be a community-based plant shop, so please continue to support us! 💪

announcements.title: 🍀 Bring Good Luck?! Four-Leaf Clover 🍀
announcements.body:
Four-leaf clovers are said to bring happiness to those who find them! 🍀
We have them for sale in pots!
They make a great gift for loved ones too! 🎁

After the rain, the store is filled with the moist scent of greenery. 😌
The plants are shining brightly! ✨
Please come and be soothed.

announcements.title: 🌻 Brighten Your Summer! Sunflower Seedlings Are Here
announcements.body:
Sunflower seedlings, a classic summer flower, have arrived! 🌻
Why not brighten up your garden with energetic sunflowers?
We also have dwarf varieties that you can enjoy on your balcony! 😊

Today's high is forecast to exceed 30℃! 🥵
Please be very careful about heatstroke.
Also, be careful not to expose your plants to too much direct sunlight! ⚠️

announcements.title: 🌸 Cherry Blossom Season 🌸 Enjoy Spring with Potted Arrangements!
announcements.body:
We're eagerly awaiting the cherry blossoms! 🌸
We offer gorgeous potted arrangements combining cherry blossoms with other spring flowers.
Why not enjoy the cherry blossom viewing atmosphere at home?

A new sprout on a plant! 🌱
It's truly heartwarming to watch them grow.
May you also find new discoveries with your plants at home! ✨

announcements.title: 🌼 A Must-See for Gardening Beginners!
announcements.body:
"I want to start gardening, but I don't know where to begin..."
We have starter kits perfect for you!
They include soil, pots, seedlings, and fertilizer, so you can start right away! 🔰

Why not challenge yourself to garden maintenance this Golden Week? 
Our store will be open throughout Golden Week! 💪
We look forward to your visit!

announcements.title: 🐞 This is for Aphid Control!
announcements.body:
Are you bothered by aphids that increase in spring?
Our recommended pest control product is a natural spray.
It's gentle on both plants and people, and very effective! 👍

A neighbor consulted us about garden maintenance.
It's wonderful to be able to support everyone's green life as a local plant shop! ☺️

announcements.title: 🎋 For Tanabata Decorations Too! Bamboo Leaves for Sale
announcements.body:
Tanabata is just around the corner! 🎋
We're selling bamboo leaves for decorating with wishes written on strips of paper.
Why not make summer memories with your children? 🌌

That's all for today! 
The night air is chilly, so please stay warm. 
We look forward to seeing you with a smile tomorrow! 😊

announcements.title: 🎁 Mini Bonsai for a Touch of Japanese Elegance
announcements.body:
Mini bonsai, condensing the beauty of nature into a small space.
Their palm size makes them popular and easy to display.
We have varieties that are easy for beginners to grow too! 🍵

We received happy feedback from a customer, saying, "The flowers I bought the other day bloomed beautifully!" 🌸
We are truly delighted! Thank you very much! 💖

announcements.title: 🐠 Cool Water Plants for Medaka Bowls
announcements.body:
Why not enjoy some cool relief with a medaka fishbowl for the summer heat? 
We have a wide variety of water plants that go well with medaka. 
Adding water plants also helps your medaka thrive! 🐟

That sudden thunderstorm surprised us! ⚡️
The plants might have been surprised too.
We're looking forward to the sky after the rain! 🌈

announcements.title: 🌷 Spring Fair Now On! 🌷
announcements.body:
Our Spring Fair, featuring a full array of spring flowers, starts today! 
We have a wide selection of great deals, including flowers to brighten your new life and gardening supplies! 🎉

We've changed the background music in the store! 🎵
We hope it creates an even more relaxing atmosphere.
Please listen in! 👂

announcements.title: 🎁 Thoughtful Flowers for Respect for the Aged Day
announcements.body:
To your grandparents, with gratitude. 
We suggest heartfelt gifts, including auspicious flowers for longevity and easy-to-care-for potted plants! 💐👵👴

Are you struggling with preparing soil for your home garden?
We offer soil and fertilizers tailored to your needs.
Good soil is essential for growing healthy vegetables! 💪

announcements.title: 💧 Don't Let Your Plants Die with a Watering Checker!
announcements.body:
Most plant deaths are caused by either too little or too much watering.
A watering checker lets you see the soil's dryness at a glance.
It's a convenient tool recommended for beginners! 👍

The hydrangeas blooming in front of the store are so beautiful! 💜
They really brighten up the gloomy rainy season!

announcements.title: 🎄 Christmas Rose Reservations Now Open!
announcements.body:
Reservations for Christmas roses, which brighten up winter gardens, are now open! 
Quantities are limited, so please reserve yours early. 
We can't wait for next winter! 😊

Today, we're showcasing rare carnivorous plants grown in the store! 
They're very popular with children too! 🐛✨

announcements.title: 🎁 Perfect Bouquets for Birthday Gifts
announcements.body:
How about a custom-made bouquet as a birthday gift for your loved one? 
We'll create it with care to match the recipient's image! 💐

Is it time to prepare your summer potted arrangements? 
Choosing cool colors and heat-resistant plants is key! 🎐

announcements.title: 🎍 Japanese Plants for New Year's Decorations
announcements.body:
It's still a bit early, but Japanese plants that can be used for next year's New Year's decorations have arrived. 
Why not welcome the New Year with auspicious plants like Sago Palm and Heavenly Bamboo? 🎍

Recently, more people are enjoying houseplants grown hydroponically.
It's hygienic because it doesn't use soil, and it looks stylish too! ✨

announcements.title: 💡 Solve Insufficient Sunlight with Plant Lights!
announcements.body:
Even in rooms with poor sunlight, plant lights are here to help! 
They provide the necessary light for plant growth. 
We also have many stylish designs! 💡

Please be careful of strong winds! ⚠️
Move potted plants on balconies to a safe place so they don't blow away.
Let's protect your precious plants!

announcements.title: 🐝 Plant Flowers That Are Bee-Friendly
announcements.body:
Bees are essential for plant pollination! 🐝
Why not plant flowers that bees love to help protect the ecosystem?
We offer bee-friendly plants in our store! 🌼

Are you misting your plant leaves? 💧
Especially in summer, when it's dry, misting the leaves frequently will help your plants grow healthy!

announcements.title: 🌿 Aromatherapy Too! Relax with the Scent of Herbs
announcements.body:
Fragrant herbs like lavender and chamomile can have relaxing effects! 😌
There are many ways to enjoy them, from displaying them in your room to making herb tea! ☕

We received a question from a customer about how to grow plants.
Feel free to ask us anything, no matter how small.
Let's enjoy a green life together! 🌱

announcements.title: 💐 Bridal Bouquet Consultations Available
announcements.body:
Congratulations on your wedding! 💖
We'll create a bridal bouquet with care, tailored to your image, to adorn your special day.
Please feel free to consult us! 💍

Today, the weather is on-and-off rain! ☔️
On days like this, it's nice to leisurely admire the plants indoors.
Please enjoy a peaceful moment.

announcements.title: 🎍 Auspicious Plants to Adorn the New Year
announcements.body:
For the New Year, why not decorate with auspicious plants like Japanese Rohdea and Heavenly Bamboo? 
You can welcome the new year with a fresh feeling! ✨

The lovely flowers of the succulents in the store have bloomed! 🌸
Even though they're small, they have a strong presence and are soothing to look at! 😊
Please come and see them in person!

announcements.title: 🐛 This is for Slug Control!
announcements.body:
Are you bothered by slugs that appear during the humid season?
We have slug control products that are gentle on plants.
Let's protect your precious plants from slugs! 🐌

Enjoy the long summer nights with candles and greenery! 🕯️
Combining aromatherapy candles with houseplants is also recommended! 🌿

announcements.title: ✨ Popular Monstera, Back in Stock!
announcements.body:
Thank you for your patience! 
Popular Monstera is back in stock. 
Its distinctive split leaves are a great accent for any room! 💚

Today is Valentine's Day! 🍫
How about flower chocolates as a gift for your loved one?
They're so cute, you almost don't want to eat them! 💖

announcements.title: 🌸 Bouquets for Graduation and Entrance Celebrations
announcements.body:
It's graduation and entrance season! 🎓🌸
We'll create bouquets with care to celebrate new beginnings.
We can suggest options based on your budget and image, so please feel free to consult us.

Are you thinking about renovating your garden?
Our expert staff will propose garden designs that meet your wishes.
Please feel free to consult us first! 🌳

announcements.title: 🍉 Summer is Here! Try Growing Watermelons!
announcements.body:
Why not try growing watermelons with your children? 🍉
Experience the joy of harvesting sweet and juicy watermelons at home!
We'll provide full support, from choosing seedlings to growing tips! 💪

We've placed a new potted arrangement at the store entrance! 💐
Please check it out when you visit! ✨
We hope you enjoy the flowers that change with each season.

announcements.title: 🦟 Mosquito Repellent! Lemongrass and Citronella
announcements.body:
Perfect for summer camping and BBQs! 
Lemongrass and citronella seedlings, which have mosquito repellent effects, have arrived. 
We also recommend making your own aromatherapy candles and sprays! 🏕️

Today, the scent of soil in the morning is so pleasant. 🌿
Handling plants truly calms the mind.
Why not refresh yourself by playing in the dirt too?

announcements.title: 🌸 The Charm of Mimosa, Heradling Early Spring
announcements.body:
Fluffy yellow mimosa flowers are now in stock! 💛
Mimosa, with the flower language of "gratitude," is perfect for gifts.
Just looking at them will make you feel energized! 😊

Are you sure you're transplanting at the right time? 
The appropriate timing varies depending on the type of plant.
If you have any questions, please feel free to ask! 🪴

announcements.title: 🎉 Grand Opening Anniversary Sale!
announcements.body:
Thanks to all of you, our store has reached its 〇th anniversary! 
To show our appreciation, we're holding an anniversary sale. 
During the period, eligible products will be at a special price! Please take advantage of this opportunity! 🎁

Today's recommendation is Anthurium! ❤️
It features heart-shaped spathes and long-lasting flowers, so you can enjoy it for a long time.
The vibrant red will be a great accent for your room! ✨

announcements.title: 💧 Summer Watering, What are the Key Points?
announcements.body:
When watering in summer, timing is crucial! 
Avoid the hottest part of the day and water generously in the morning or evening.
Please be careful as it can cause leaf burn! ☀️

Small flowers have bloomed on the cactus growing in the store! 🌵🌸
Cacti are usually unassuming, but when they bloom, they become instantly vibrant!
Please come and see them in person! 😊

announcements.title: 🍃 Detox Water with Fresh Herbs for Summer
announcements.body:
Perfect for hot summer days! 
How about detox water with mint, cucumber, lemon, and more? 
It looks refreshing and will help you refresh from the inside out! 🍹

Are your plants weakening due to the winter cold? 
We also carry cold protection goods for cold-sensitive plants. 
Let's help your precious plants survive the winter! 🧣

announcements.title: 🏠 Start Growing Vegetables at Home!
announcements.body:
Home gardening allows you to experience the joy of eating your own grown vegetables.
From beginner-friendly planter kits to full-scale garden creation,
we'll support you according to your level! 🍅🥬

Today, local children came to observe plants! 🌱
We hope future gardeners will grow up from here!

announcements.title: ✨ New Arrivals! Stylish Planters
announcements.body:
If you want to change the atmosphere of your room, how about changing your planter?
Various styles of planters, from simple to highly designed, have newly arrived.
Find your favorite pot! 🏺

The sun is shining after the rain! ☀️
The plants also seem to be enjoying the precious sunlight.
Let's make the most of this brief sunny spell for watering and ventilation!

announcements.title: 🎉 Summer Plant Sale Now On!
announcements.body:
A chance to get heat-resistant plants at a great price! 
We have a wide variety of plants with a tropical atmosphere, such as hibiscus and bougainvillea! 🌺
Don't miss this opportunity!

Small berries have started to appear on the coffee plant we're growing in the store! 🍒
We're looking forward to harvesting them! 
We hope to be able to offer our own homegrown coffee someday! ☕️

announcements.title: 🍃 Stress Relief! Plants with Forest Bathing Effects
announcements.body:
Feel like you're forest bathing at home! 🌲
Plants that release phytoncides are said to have stress-reducing effects.
Why not try incorporating them when you want to relax? 😊

Today, a customer consulted us about their plant.
Its leaves had changed color.
We helped them find the cause and gave advice to help it recover! 🌿

announcements.title: 🎁 Perfect for Spring Gifts! Preserved Flowers
announcements.body:
Preserved flowers last a long time and don't need watering.
They're perfect for various occasions, such as graduations, entrance ceremonies, and transfers! 💐
Why not preserve memories for a long time with everlasting flowers?

The mornings and evenings have been getting colder recently.
Let's also be careful about temperature differences for our plants.
Especially watch out for chilly nights! ⚠️

announcements.title: 🎐 Wind Chimes and Greenery to Create a Cool Summer Atmosphere
announcements.body:
Wind chimes playing a refreshing sound. 
Why not create a space that makes you forget the summer heat by combining them with greenery by the window?
Cool to look at, cool to hear! 🎐

A new part-time staff member joined us today! 
They may be a bit inexperienced, but we'd appreciate your warm support. 
Thank you in advance! 😊

announcements.title: 🌿 Perfect for Potted Arrangements! Color Leaves
announcements.body:
Color leaves with beautiful foliage are perfect accents for potted arrangements!
You can enjoy various colors each season.
Why not brighten up your garden or balcony? 🎨

Golden Week is already in its latter half! 
Did everyone have a wonderful Golden Week? 
Let's do our best starting next week! 💪

announcements.title: 🌻 Summer Vacation Science Project! Plant Observation Kit
announcements.body:
How about a plant observation kit for your child's summer vacation science project? 
It's a great opportunity to record plant growth, sketch them, and discover the wonders of nature! 🔬

We've installed a new signboard in front of the store today! 
We drew it ourselves and made it cute, so please take a look! 🎨

announcements.title: 💧 Hydroponics Experience Workshop
announcements.body:
Would you like to try hydroponics, which doesn't use soil?
This workshop is fun for children too.
You can easily start with plastic bottles or empty containers! ♻️

We also collect unwanted pots at our store.
We cooperate with recycling to protect the environment, so please feel free to bring them in! 🌱🌍

announcements.title: 🍍 Tropical Fruit Seedlings Have Arrived!
announcements.body:
Would you like to grow tropical fruits at home?
Rare seedlings like pineapple and passion fruit have arrived for a limited time!
Let's enjoy tropical flavors at home! 🌴

The New Year's holiday is over, and many of you may be back to work today.
Our store is open as usual.
Please come and find some healing greenery on your way home from work! 🌱

announcements.title: ✨ Spring Bulb Plants, Now's the Time to Plant!
announcements.body:
Bulb plants that bloom beautifully in spring.
By planting tulips, hyacinths, and muscari now,
you can enjoy magnificent flowers next spring! 🌷

It looks like it will be a very cold day today! 🥶
Please dress warmly when you come to visit.
We'll be waiting for you with warm tea! 🍵

announcements.title: 🐱 Keep Your Cats Happy with Catnip!
announcements.body:
Do you know that catnip is essential for cats? 
It helps with digestion and expelling hairballs. 
We sell catnip seeds that you can easily grow at home! 🌱🐈

The cherry blossom forecast has been announced! 🌸
We can feel the arrival of spring, and our hearts are pounding.
We have many spring-like flowers in stock too! 😊

announcements.title: 🎁 Mini Bouquets for Mother's Day Gifts!
announcements.body:
A mini bouquet is perfect for conveying a small token of gratitude! 💐
Its cute size makes it easy to give as a gift.
Message cards can also be added! 💖

The rainy season has begun! 🐸
It's humid, but the plants are vibrant thanks to the rain.
Please enjoy the unique expressions of plants on rainy days! 💧

announcements.title: 💡 Grow Indoors with LED Plant Grow Lights!
announcements.body:
Even in places without sunlight, LED plant grow lights are here to help! 
You can grow vegetables and herbs indoors.
Make home gardening even more accessible! 🥬

Thank you to all the customers who visited us this weekend! 
May your encounters with plants bring color to your lives! ✨

announcements.title: 🎍 Stylish Kokedama for New Year's Decorations
announcements.body:
Kokedama, with its Japanese charm, is perfect for New Year's decorations.
We have various plants fashioned into kokedama.
We also have many designs that suit modern spaces! 🌿

It's a snowy and cold day today! ⛄️
On days like this, it's nice to take care of your plants in a warm room.
Wipe their leaves and remove dead ones, showing them some love! 💖

announcements.title: 🌸 Spring Flowers for Easter Decorations!
announcements.body:
Easter is coming soon! 🐰🥚
Why not decorate your room with spring-like pastel colored flowers?
We have many bright flowers like tulips and sweet peas! 💐

Recently, we've been accepting SNS posts about plants from customers! 
Share your proud plants with the hashtag #〇〇plants (shop name)! 📸
We'll feature wonderful posts on our account too! 😊

announcements.title: ✨ Fresh Greenery for the New Green Season!
announcements.body:
The season of vibrant new greenery has arrived! 🍃
Why not bring fresh greenery into your room to refresh your mind and body?
Popular Ficus and Pothos are also in stock! 🌱

It's been a humid and hot few days! 🥵
For humidity control in your room, how about plants with dehumidifying effects?
We introduce beautiful plants like Sansevieria and Monstera! 🌿

announcements.title: 🎋 Tanabata Festival! Write Your Wishes on Strips of Paper
announcements.body:
We're holding the Tanabata Festival again this year, where you can write your wishes on strips of paper and hang them up! 
We have bamboo branches prepared in the store, so please come and write your wishes!
Children are very welcome too! 😊

A new week has begun! 
May this week be wonderful for all of you! ✨
Our store is open today and full of energy! 💪

announcements.title: 🌱 Houseplant Repotting Service Available
announcements.body:
Are your houseplants getting too big? 
If you're unsure when to repot or find it difficult to do yourself, please consult us.
Our professionals will repot them with care! 🪴

We've been seeing more customers with children during spring break! 👦👧
We have many cute mini plants in the store that children will enjoy too! 🌱

announcements.title: ☔️ Enjoy Rainy Days! Indoor Gardening
announcements.body:
Even if it keeps raining, indoor gardening is fine! 
There are many ways to enjoy it, like growing herbs indoors or making terrariums! 🌿

Today, I got sweaty doing garden maintenance! 💦
But seeing the plants become beautiful makes the fatigue disappear!
This is plant love! ❤️

announcements.title: 🌊 Just Before Summer Vacation! Plants That Evoke the Sea
announcements.body:
Summer vacation is just around the corner!
Why not decorate your room with plants that evoke the sea?
We have refreshing plants like air plants and coral moss! 🐠

Today, the smell of soil from the morning is so pleasant. 🌿
Touching plants truly calms the mind.
Why not refresh yourself by playing in the dirt too?

announcements.title: ❤️ Express Your Love with a Bouquet of Roses! 🌹
announcements.body:
How about a bouquet of red roses for a proposal or anniversary? 
The number of roses also has meaning.
Convey your feelings with flowers! 💖

Today's high is forecast to be 20℃! 
It's a spring-like day, perfect for going out! 🌸
Please stop by our store on your walk! 🚶‍♀️

announcements.title: ✨ Popular Mini Roses, Back in Stock!
announcements.body:
Cute mini roses are back in stock! 🌹
They're popular because they can be easily grown on balconies or windowsills.
We have a wide variety of colors, so find your favorite mini rose! 😊

Golden Week is already the last day. 
Did everyone have a wonderful Golden Week? 
Let's do our best starting tomorrow! 💪

announcements.title: 🐛 Rainy Season Pest Control! Gnat Extermination
announcements.body:
Are you bothered by gnats that increase during the rainy season?
We sell gnat repellent products and gentle pesticides for plants.
Let's maintain a comfortable indoor space! 🪰

It was a very humid day today! 🥵
Have some cold tea and get some rest.
We look forward to seeing you all with energy tomorrow! 😊

announcements.title: 🎍 For Kagami Mochi Decorations! Oranges with Leaves
announcements.body:
Oranges with leaves, essential for Kagami Mochi, a classic New Year's decoration! 🍊
We have fresh ones available in our store.
Let's decorate with a wish for a good year! 🙏

Are the tips of your plant leaves wilting recently? 
That might be a sign of dryness or lack of water.
Restore their health with proper watering and humidity control!

announcements.title: ✨ Call for Spring! Bulb Planting Class
announcements.body:
For those who don't know how to plant bulbs, 
we're holding a planting class! 
Beginners are welcome! Let's make beautiful flowers bloom in spring! 🌷

Today, a customer told me a proud story about the roses they grew in their garden! 🌹
Seeing photos of their beautifully bloomed roses made us happy too! 💖

announcements.title: 🐸 Frog Figurines and Aquatic Plants for a Cool Atmosphere
announcements.body:
Perfect for the rainy season, frog figurines and aquatic plants have arrived! 
Float them in a water lily bowl or enjoy them with medaka fish.
You can create a soothing space! 🐸💧

The season for harvesting summer vegetables is here! 
Freshly picked tomatoes and cucumbers are exceptionally delicious! 😋
How's your home garden doing?

announcements.title: 🎍 New Year's Holiday Business Hours
announcements.body:
Our store will be closed from **MM/DD** to **MM/DD** for the New Year's holidays.
We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause and appreciate your understanding.
The last business day of the year is **MM/DD**.
